item.description:
We have several song leaders who will pass out the lyrics and invite you to sing together IN SPANISH! We will do some songs you know, and some that you don't. Bring a favorite song in Spanish if you wish, and if you can teach us (bring lyrics).

If you have been told that you don't have a good singing voice, that's no excuse for staying home! When we sing together, it all sounds good!

Join us!!Nos vemos!

group.name: The Hartford Spanish Language Meetup Group

item.name: Tertulia: The Sound of Music - singing together in Spanish
